Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.name: locationUpdatesEnabled
Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.abstract: Flag to enable/disable location updates. Defaults to NO.

Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.name: backgroundLocationUpdatesAllowed
Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.abstract: Flag to allow/disallow location updates in the background. Defaults to NO.

Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.name: lastLocation
Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.abstract: Returns the last received location. Can be nil if no location has been received.

Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.name: -isLocationDeniedOrRestricted
Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.abstract: Check if the user has denied the app’s request to use location services.

Classes/UALocation.html#/c:objc(cs)UALoc.abstract: Check if the user has granted this application access to location information with reduced accuracy.
